name: honk
content:
honk verb [I or T]
(SOUND)
Add to word list
Add to word list
If a goose or a car horn honks, it makes a short, loud sound.

honk verb [I or T]
(VOMIT)
UK slang to vomit: honk (up) He honked (up) all over the floor.

a short, loud sound made by a car horn or a goose: He gave us a honk on his horn as he drove off.

to make a short, loud noise, or to sound a horn to make such a noise: [ I/T ] The cars honking (their horns) kept us awake half the night.
